section.heading: Southwest Waterfront Park Bus Prohibition.

para.text: No person shall operate or park a bus, as that term is defined in 24 DCMR § 3599.1, on:

The streets within or adjacent to Record Lots 88, 89, or 90, in Square 473, including Water Street, S.W., and M Place, S.W., except the portions of Maine Avenue, S.W., and M Street, S.W., within or adjacent to Record Lots 88, 89, or 90 in Square 473; or
The portion of Sixth Street, S.W., that is south of M Street, S.W.
Any entity listed in 18 DCMR § 3002.1 or 3003.1 may issue a notice of infraction for a violation of subsection (a) of this section.
A person who violates subsection (a) of this section shall be fined $150.
A notice of infraction issued pursuant to this section shall be adjudicated pursuant to Chapter 23 of this title.
